SELECT DISTINCT m1.id AS id, m1.name AS name, m1.pid AS pid, (CASE WHEN m1.url IS NOT NULL THEN m1.url WHEN m2.url IS NOT NULL THEN m2.url WHEN m1.type != 1 THEN "/404" ELSE null END) AS url, m1.type AS type, m1.icon AS icon FROM (
) AS temp LEFT JOIN menus_view AS m1 ON temp.mid = m1.id LEFT JOIN menus_view AS m2 ON m1.ref_id = m2.id WHERE m1.status = 1 AND m1.type <= 3 ORDER BY m1.pid ASC, m1.type ASC
